system_prompt: You are a helpful and precise assistant in labeling the domain of the instruction.

defaults.prompt1: You will be given a list of 10 domains. After you see the instruction, you need to label the domain that the instruction is most likely to be:
defaults.prompt2: Which domain best fits the following instruction? Please select only one domain from the list below: Language, Culture, Health, History, Natural Science, Math, Social Science, Technology, Coding, and Humanities. Please provide only the domain name without the numbering index. In ambiguous cases, you may label two domains, separating them with a comma.

description: Prompt for labeling the domain of the instruction.
